io.sphere.sdk.carts

Interface CartLike<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of this CartLike, order or cart
    All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, DefaultModel<T>, DefaultModelView<T>, Identifiable<T>, Referenceable<T>, Timestamped, Versioned<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cart, Order

    public interface CartLike<T>
extends DefaultModel<T>
    Interface to collect the common stuff between carts and orders.
